meanings.definition: To carry on or conduct business, negotiations, etc.
meanings.sent1: She was transacting with clients all day.
meanings.sent2: The company is transacting with suppliers to get the best deals.
meanings.sent3: While transacting at the market, she accidentally bought a giant watermelon.
meanings.sent4: The team was transacting smoothly, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Transacting efficiently is key to running a successful business.

meanings.sent1: He enjoys transacting online for convenience.
meanings.sent2: The bank is transacting millions of dollars daily.
meanings.sent3: Transacting at the antique store felt like stepping back in time.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was transacting as if they had known each other for years.
meanings.sent5: Transacting responsibly ensures a fair deal for all parties involved.
